beesweethoneyfarms at bee sweet honey farms


beesweethoneyfarms:

At Bee Sweet Honey Farms LLC., we use poultry to maintain a clean beeyard. Chickens help protect our colonies from mites and other predatory insects; as opposed to using chemicals and pesticides.

Amis apiculteurs (et vous êtes nombreux :D) la solution naturelle à la protection de vos abeilles. La poule.

beesweethoneyfarms at bee sweet honey farms

My analog watches are my reminder that utility exists apart from an internet connection and usefulness doesn’t require the latest software. Spicy bean and rice burritos
